casebody.data:
No. 10-5365. Gerard D. Grandoit, Petitioner v. Benjamin J. Gilson, et al. 562 U.S. 807, 131 S. Ct. 284,

178 L. Ed. 2d 8,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 7818. October 4, 2010.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the First Circuit dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
